mod.presencefootsteps.name: Presence Footsteps Lite
key.presencefootsteps.debug_toggle: Toggle debug entry in f3 menu
pf.default_sounds.name: Default Sound Pack
pf.default_sounds.missing: No sound packs detected. Go to resource packs and enable the %s to get started.
menu.pf.title: Presence Footsteps Lite Options
menu.pf.volume.tooltip: The global volume of all presence footsteps sounds. Set to 0 if you wish to disable the mod entirely.
menu.pf.volume.hostile_entities.tooltip: Changes the volume of enemies' footsteps.
menu.pf.volume.passive_entities.tooltip: Changes the volume of animal' footsteps.
menu.pf.volume.player.tooltip: Changes the volume of your own footsteps.
menu.pf.volume.other_players.tooltip: Changes the volume of other players' footsteps when in multiplayer.
menu.pf.volume.running.tooltip:
How much the footsteps' volume can change when running.

This value is ADDED to the total volume will scale with your speed.

It's recommended to set this to something small first then make adjustments as needed. Larger values will make the effect more pronounced.
menu.pf.volume.wet.tooltip: Changes the volume of sounds created when walking on blocks that are wet.
menu.pf.volume.foliage.tooltip: Changes the volume of sounds created when walking through plants and tall grass.
menu.pf.stance.none.tooltip: Auto will pick an appropriate stance, currently behaves identical to Biped
menu.pf.stance.flying.tooltip: Pegasus emulates a 4-legged walking mode with wings
menu.pf.stance.flying_biped.tooltip: Avian emulates a 2-legged walking mode with wings
menu.pf.report.full.tooltip: Prints out what sounds every block and entity in the game are using.
menu.pf.report.concise.tooltip: Prints out what sounds every block and entity in the game are using. (Concise: Only prints entries that are missing a sounds mapping)
menu.pf.report.acoustics.tooltip: Exports the acoustics file in the current format. Use this to update your resource pack.
